events.title: Defensive Programming
events.description: Apply Defensive Programming principles and write defensive tests to eliminate modern security bugs. Hands-on and instructor led.
events.about: You will learn a new approach to write a robust and hardened software from the ground-up. You will learn defensive design and implementation. You will identify threats at an early stage of feature introduction. You will learn how to write security tests for classes of security bugs. This is hands-on course filled with lots of practical labs in Java and C#
events.recipients: Software engineers, Security Champions, DevOps, Secure Code Auditors

events.title: Defensive Programming
events.description: Apply Defensive Programming principles and write defensive tests to eliminate modern security bugs. Hands-on and instructor led.
events.about: You will learn a new approach to write robust and hardened software from the ground-up. You will learn defensive design and implementation. You will identify threats at an early stage of feature introduction. You will learn how to write security tests for classes of security bugs. This is hands-on course filled with lots of practical labs in JavaScript and Python
events.recipients: Software engineers, Security Champions, DevOps, Secure Code Auditors

events.title: Defensive Testing
events.description: Find edge cases that result in security bugs and write security tests to discover them. Hands-on and instructor led.
events.about: You will learn how a security professional tests for security bugs. You will build an adversary mindset to generate test cases. You will learn how to write security tests for classes of modern security bugs in Java and C#.
events.recipients: Software engineers, Test engineers, Security testers

events.title: Defensive Testing
events.description: Find edge cases that result in security bugs and write security tests to discover them. Hands-on and instructor led.
events.about: You will learn how a security professional tests for security bugs. You will build an adversary mindset to generate test cases. You will learn how to write security tests for classes of modern security bugs in JavaScript and Python.
events.recipients: Software engineers, Test engineers, Security testers

events.title: Secure Programming Workshop
events.description: A hands-on workshop and overview of Defensive Programming to find security bugs.
events.about: The workshop will cover: Why we have so many vulnerabilities in our software, Why after-thought patching is ineffective, What is Defensive Design and Programming, A real-world security incident caused by a security bug, Guided lab: How to detect the security bug
events.recipients: Anyone interested in Secure Programming and Testing

events.title: Private Workshops
events.description:
Looking for a private class for your team?
Let's discuss your requirements.

events.title: Docker hardening
events.description: Find and eliminate most common mistakes in building Docker images that result in insecure containers.
events.about: Find how to identify and eliminate the most common security mistakes in building Docker images. These mistake can be misused by an adversary to compromise container-based systems.
